timeline.message:
WPS / handle point geometries for QGis server

Also avoid triggering a GFI call when drawing a point with GeometryDirective
WPS / send geometries in the map view CRS

Draw / draw directive takes an optional callback

This can be leveraged to use the directive for something else
than exporting a file.
Draw / allow undefined save callback in draw directive
Draw / Allow saving even on empty source if save callback defined
Draw / make the draw options layout more compact

Draw / refactor to allow modifying text and simplify logic

Now the text content is treated like any other style property,
and not as a separate field (scope.text) directly on the gn-draw directive.

There is no need to store the text in the 'name' field of features anymore.

On the other hand, the object type (text, point, line, polygon) is stored
on the features '_type' property. This is actually not necessary for lines
and polygons, but it is to discriminate text and points (since the geometry
type is the same).

For backwards compatibility, if a JSON file is loaded with features in the
previous schema, they will be adapted to the new one.
Draw / fix text input in style form
IndexRequest / fix array unique filter in index request builder

Md View / prepend current URL path for MD links in search results

Without this, opening a record in a webpage with a <base> element
might route the user to a wrong URL.

Map / Allow adding a WMTS layer from cap without OperationsMetadata in it

the OperationsMetadata element might not be present in the WMTS capabilities
which requires a work around for getting layer and capabilities url.
Map / prevent adding several times the same layer when not specifying style

Map / handle layer names with multiple ':'

Without this commit, a layername such as namespace:domainABC:layer would
not be correctly found in the Capabilities document since only the 'layer'
part would be kept for comparison

Editor / improve add directory entry modal layout

Add button is on the right and facets are now scrollable on their own.
Print / remove reference to MapQuest
Print / handle XYZ layers with a different path format (e.g. z/y/x)

Print / handle legend URLs with accented chars in it

The legend url is converted to a URL object to ensure
proper formatting.
Wro4j / reorder bs-table extensions to avoid CSV export not showing in tables

Utility / Fix thumbnail modal not working for records using draft mode

Records in draft would sometimes have their thumbnail url appended
with ?approved=... , which breaks thumbnail modal opening.

Wro4j / remove remaining ref to closure lib

closure/base.js will still be used in debug mode
Backports of WFS filter & indexing (admin) from Sextant

Wro4j / remove remaining ref to closure lib

closure/base.js will still be used in debug mode

Wro4j / remove remaining ref to closure lib

closure/base.js will still be used in debug mode

timeline.bodyText: Do not reintroduce version number in API path. In version 4, the API version is GN version. Version in path has been removed.

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should continue to support both approach. md and Linkstree field may not be defined. Will rework it with a promise.
timeline.author: fxprunayre

replies.bodyText: Restored a promise which resolves to linksTree if defined.
replies.author: fxprunayre

timeline.message: WFS indexing / Remove version number from API path. Use a promise for appProfile if no linksTree field. Fix non existing constant.
WFS indexing / Fix delete and backport changes on date type.

timeline.author: jahow

replies.bodyText:
The gnHttpServices
https://github.com/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/blame/4.0.x/web-ui/src/main/resources/catalog/components/catalog/CatalogService.js#L299-L322 has not been modified in the last 2 years, so probably not the main way we are using for accessing the API (even if it was probably a good idea 7 years ago).
replies.author: fxprunayre

timeline.message:
WFS Indexing / Dashboard to start/stop/schedule harvesting.

* Fix URL containing special character
* Add missing translations
* Use similar icons used in other app pages eg. start/remove...
* AppProfile may be empty or null
* Migrate code to JPA update and OpenAPI

Initially done by @cmangeat for Ifremer/Sextant

WFS Indexing / Add custom WFSClient to use GFI target namespace to define the strategy.

This allows to support QGIS.
Tested with GeoServer, MapServer and QGIS.
If typename not found, make a check without taking into account namespace.
Harvested records / Editable depending on config.
WFS Indexing / Parameters may be fine tuned using applicationProfile. Restore retreival of applicationProfile ...
WFS Indexing / Parameters may be fine tuned using applicationProfile. Restore retreival of applicationProfile ... / Missing changes.
WFS Indexing / Do not log an error on report UPDATE which is fine.
WFS Indexing / Save strategy with job properties.
WFS Indexing / Update test - JPA, Autowire required bean.
